statements: UPDATE anonymized_user_data SET age = 30, behavior_score = 5.7 WHERE user_id = '1234-5678-9012'
UPDATE anonymized_user_data SET location = 'New York', gender = 'Male' WHERE user_id = '9876-5432-1098'
UPDATE anonymized_user_data SET age = 30, behavior_score = 0.85 WHERE user_id = '12345678-1234-5678-1234-567812345678';
UPDATE anonymized_user_data SET gender = 'Female', location = 'New York' WHERE user_id = '98765432-8765-4321-9876-543298765432';
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe', email = 'john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id = 123;
UPDATE user_events SET event_type = 'LOGIN', event_date = '2022-01-01 08:00:00 UTC', event_details = '{"ip": "192.168.1.1", "location": "New York"}' WHERE user_id = 456 AND event_id = 789;
UPDATE users SET first_name = 'John', last_name = 'Doe' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_events SET event_type = 'Login', event_date = '2022-05-01T10:30:00Z' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET email='john.doe@example.com' WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE user_locations SET latitude=37.7749, longitude=-122.4194 WHERE location_id=2;
UPDATE users SET nickname = 'John Doe' WHERE user_id = 1
UPDATE user_activity SET activity_date = '2021-10-15 09:00:00' WHERE user_id = 2
UPDATE users SET age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_location SET location = 'Home', city = 'New York' WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE users SET name = 'John Doe', age = 30 WHERE user_id = 1;
UPDATE user_activity SET duration = 60, action = 'logged in' WHERE user_id = 2;
UPDATE users SET age = 30, email = 'newemail@example.com' WHERE user_id = 1001;
UPDATE purchases SET amount = 25.99, product_name = 'New Product' WHERE purchase_id = 2001;
UPDATE users SET email='updatedemail@example.com', age=30 WHERE user_id=1;
UPDATE purchases SET amount=99.99, purchase_date='2022-09-15' WHERE user_id=3 AND product_name='Example Product';
